alert.note: Alert for Bolivar Peninsula; Chambers; Coastal Galveston; Galveston Island (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 24 at 5:39PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Galveston and southeastern Chambers Counties through 645 PM CST... At 539 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near San Leon to Offatts Bayou to 6 miles east of San Luis Pass. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Galveston Causeway, Galveston Island West End, Texas City, Galveston Pier 21, Pelican Island, Crystal Beach, Schlitterbahn, Scholes Field, The Strand, Port Bolivar, Offatts Bayou, Gilchrist, Rollover Pass, Galveston Pleasure Pier, Bolivar Peninsula and Moody Gardens. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bolivar Peninsula; Chambers; Coastal Galveston; Galveston Island
